description: Contents: Commentary on the Sefer Yetsirah by Naḥmanides (ff. 1r-14r). Commentary on the Song of Songs by Johanan ben Isaac Allemanno, divided into two parts: Introduction to the commentary called The Song of Solomon's Ascent (ff. 17r-129r) and the commentary called Ḥesheḳ Shlomoh (The Delight of Solomon) (ff. 129r-166v).
title: Miscellany
author: Allemanno, Johanan ben Isaac
